title: How does my TalkBand B2 track activities and sleep patterns?
answer:
Your TalkBand B2 contains an advanced 6-axis motion sensor and adopts cutting-edge technology that allows it to track your fitness activities (walking, running, cycling, and hiking) or sleep patterns. 

 The TalkBand B2's sensor identifies your status based on motion range, frequency, and logic and determines whether you are sleeping or exercising.
